mapper.insert: INSERT INTO AT_USER( CP_CODE, OID, I_TYPE, I_NAME, LOGIN_PWD, USER_NAME, SEX, WORKER_NO, JOB_DUTY, TELNO, EMAIL, IS_USED, IS_ADMIN, ORDER_NUM, AUTH_STATE, LAST_LOGIN_DATE, STATUS, LOGIN_IP, LOGIN_TIME, OPERATOR, LAST_OPERATOR, REMARK ) VALUES( #{cpCode}, #{oid}, #{itype}, #{iname}, #{loginPwd}, #{userName}, #{sex}, #{workerNo}, #{jobDuty}, #{telno}, #{email}, #{idUsed}, #{isAdmin}, #{orderNum}, #{authState}, #{lastLoginDate}, #{status}, #{loginIp}, #{loginTime}, #{operator}, #{lastOperator}, #{remark} )
mapper.select: SELECT ID as id, CP_CODE as cpCode, OID as oid, I_TYPE as itype, I_NAME as iname, LOGIN_PWD as loginPwd, USER_NAME as userName, SEX as sex, WORKER_NO as workerNo, JOB_DUTY as jobDuty, TELNO as telno, EMAIL as email, IS_USED as isUsed, IS_ADMIN as isAdmin, ORDER_NUM as orderNum, AUTH_STATE as authState, LAST_LOGIN_DATE as lastLoginDate, STATUS as status, LOGIN_IP as loginIp, LOGIN_TIME as loginTime, OPERATOR as operator, CREATE_TIME as createTime, LAST_OPERATOR as lastOperator, UPDATE_TIME as updateTime, REMARK as remark FROM AT_USER WHERE 1 = 1 and OID=#{oid,jdbcType=DECIMAL} ORDER BY CREATE_TIME DESC

SELECT ID as id, CP_CODE as cpCode, OID as oid, I_TYPE as itype, I_NAME as iname, LOGIN_PWD as loginPwd, USER_NAME as userName, SEX as sex, WORKER_NO as workerNo, JOB_DUTY as jobDuty, TELNO as telno, EMAIL as email, IS_USED as isUsed, IS_ADMIN as isAdmin, ORDER_NUM as orderNum, AUTH_STATE as authState, LAST_LOGIN_DATE as lastLoginDate, STATUS as status, LOGIN_IP as loginIp, LOGIN_TIME as loginTime, OPERATOR as operator, CREATE_TIME as createTime, LAST_OPERATOR as lastOperator, UPDATE_TIME as updateTime, REMARK as remark FROM AT_USER WHERE ID=#{id}

SELECT ID as id, CP_CODE as cpCode, OID as oid, I_TYPE as itype, I_NAME as iname, LOGIN_PWD as loginPwd, USER_NAME as userName, SEX as sex, WORKER_NO as workerNo, JOB_DUTY as jobDuty, TELNO as telno, EMAIL as email, IS_USED as isUsed, IS_ADMIN as isAdmin, ORDER_NUM as orderNum, AUTH_STATE as authState, LAST_LOGIN_DATE as lastLoginDate, STATUS as status, LOGIN_IP as loginIp, LOGIN_TIME as loginTime, OPERATOR as operator, CREATE_TIME as createTime, LAST_OPERATOR as lastOperator, UPDATE_TIME as updateTime, REMARK as remark FROM AT_USER WHERE I_NAME=#{iName} and LOGIN_PWD=#{loginPwd}

SELECT ID as id, CP_CODE as cpCode, OID as oid, I_TYPE as itype, I_NAME as iname, LOGIN_PWD as loginPwd, USER_NAME as userName, SEX as sex, WORKER_NO as workerNo, JOB_DUTY as jobDuty, TELNO as telno, EMAIL as email, IS_USED as isUsed, IS_ADMIN as isAdmin, ORDER_NUM as orderNum, AUTH_STATE as authState, LAST_LOGIN_DATE as lastLoginDate, STATUS as status, LOGIN_IP as loginIp, LOGIN_TIME as loginTime, OPERATOR as operator, CREATE_TIME as createTime, LAST_OPERATOR as lastOperator, UPDATE_TIME as updateTime, REMARK as remark FROM AT_USER WHERE I_NAME=#{iName}
SELECT count(*) FROM AT_USER WHERE I_NAME=#{iName}

SELECT ID as id, CP_CODE as cpCode, OID as oid, I_TYPE as itype, I_NAME as iname, LOGIN_PWD as loginPwd, USER_NAME as userName, SEX as sex, WORKER_NO as workerNo, JOB_DUTY as jobDuty, TELNO as telno, EMAIL as email, IS_USED as isUsed, IS_ADMIN as isAdmin, ORDER_NUM as orderNum, AUTH_STATE as authState, LAST_LOGIN_DATE as lastLoginDate, STATUS as status, LOGIN_IP as loginIp, LOGIN_TIME as loginTime, OPERATOR as operator, CREATE_TIME as createTime, LAST_OPERATOR as lastOperator, UPDATE_TIME as updateTime, REMARK as remark FROM AT_USER WHERE I_NAME=#{iName}
